title: New York's Notorious 'Night-Life' Lawyer Found Dead Outside Parents' Home
content: Salvatore Strazzullo, the New York City lawyer notorious for his colourful client roster and personal scandals, was found dead in his car outside his parents' Brooklyn home on Saturday.
summary: Salvatore Strazzullo, the New York City lawyer notorious for his colourful client roster and personal scandals, was found dead in his car outside his parents' Brooklyn home on Saturday.

title: Trump Vowed To Never To Do This Again, But Did It During Musk Interview
content: Donald Trump today spent nearly an hour discussing the recent assassination attempt, something he had promised never to talk about again.
summary: Donald Trump today spent nearly an hour discussing the recent assassination attempt, something he had promised never to talk about again.

title: After Trump, Elon Musk "Happy To Host" Kamala Harris Ahead Of US Polls
content: Donald Trump said that the country "will go out of business," if Kamala Harris wins US elections 2024.
summary: Donald Trump said that the country "will go out of business," if Kamala Harris wins US elections 2024.

title: US Looks Forward To Expanding Critical Partnership With India: White House
content: The Biden Administration looks forward to expanding its "critical and critically important" partnership with India and creating a more prosperous and secure Indo-Pacific, the White House has said.
summary: The Biden Administration looks forward to expanding its "critical and critically important" partnership with India and creating a more prosperous and secure Indo-Pacific, the White House has said.

title: "You're The Greatest Cutter": Trump Praises Elon Musk For Firing Workers
content: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump's interview with billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk finally got underway on Musk's social media platform X on Monday evening.
summary: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump's interview with billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk finally got underway on Musk's social media platform X on Monday evening.

title: Trump Mocks Climate Change: 'Sea-Level Rise Means More Ocean Front Property'
content: Donald Trump ran through his checklist of conspiracy theories Monday in a rambling conversation with his uber-wealthy supporter Elon Musk that was initially derailed by what the tech titan said was a technical glitch.
summary: Donald Trump ran through his checklist of conspiracy theories Monday in a rambling conversation with his uber-wealthy supporter Elon Musk that was initially derailed by what the tech titan said was a technical glitch.

title: Vinay Mohan Kwatra Takes Charge As India's Ambassador To US
content: Vinay Mohan Kwatra took charge on Monday as Indian ambassador to the US.
summary: Vinay Mohan Kwatra took charge on Monday as Indian ambassador to the US.

title: "I'm More Of A Believer Now": Trump After Surviving Assassination Bid
content: Donald Trump recalled the moment he was shot at during a rally in Pennsylvania last month and narrated the events that followed, during a live conversation with X owner Elon Musk.
summary: Donald Trump recalled the moment he was shot at during a rally in Pennsylvania last month and narrated the events that followed, during a live conversation with X owner Elon Musk.

title: What Trump Said About Kim Jong Un In Interview With Elon Musk
content: Donald Trump today praised Russia, China and North Korea heads saying that they are at the top of their game and the US needs a strong president to tackle them.
summary: Donald Trump today praised Russia, China and North Korea heads saying that they are at the top of their game and the US needs a strong president to tackle them.

title: Trump Shares False Claim That Kamala Harris Campaign Doctored Photo
content: Donald Trump amplified a wave of false social media claims that his opponent Kamala Harris used artificial intelligence to fabricate a picture of her supporters at a Michigan rally last week -- an allegation disproved by photos and videos.
summary: Donald Trump amplified a wave of false social media claims that his opponent Kamala Harris used artificial intelligence to fabricate a picture of her supporters at a Michigan rally last week -- an allegation disproved by photos and videos.

title: Elon Musk Says Cyber Attack On X Derails Trump Interview
content: Elon Musk said Monday his much-trailed interview with Donald Trump had been derailed by a cyber attack on his social media platform.
summary: Elon Musk said Monday his much-trailed interview with Donald Trump had been derailed by a cyber attack on his social media platform.

title: What Is "DDOS Attack" Flagged By Elon Musk That Hit Donald Trump Interview?
content: Tech billionaire Elon Musk has flagged a "massive DDOS attack" on X that disrupted the airing of his interview with former Donald Trump.
summary: Tech billionaire Elon Musk has flagged a "massive DDOS attack" on X that disrupted the airing of his interview with former Donald Trump.

title: Over 47,000 People Died In Europe Last Year Due To Heat: Report
content: More than 47,000 people died in Europe due to scorching temperatures in 2023, with countries in the region's south hit the hardest, according to a report by the Barcelona Institute for Global Health (ISGlobal) published on Monday.
summary: More than 47,000 people died in Europe due to scorching temperatures in 2023, with countries in the region's south hit the hardest, according to a report by the Barcelona Institute for Global Health (ISGlobal) published on Monday.

title: 'Crashed', 'Unable To Fetch Spaces' Trend On X As Musk Interviews Trump
content: Donald Trump is being interviewed on X by its billionaire owner Elon Musk -- an influential supporter -- as the Republican ex-president rejoins the platform following a lengthy absence.
summary: Donald Trump is being interviewed on X by its billionaire owner Elon Musk -- an influential supporter -- as the Republican ex-president rejoins the platform following a lengthy absence.

title: "US Will Go Out Of Business If Kamala Harris Wins": Donald Trump To Elon Musk
content: The Elon Musk-Donald Trump interview on X, which was scheduled to begin at 5:30 AM IST, was delayed by more than 40 minutes due to a massive cyberattack.
summary: The Elon Musk-Donald Trump interview on X, which was scheduled to begin at 5:30 AM IST, was delayed by more than 40 minutes due to a massive cyberattack.

title: "This Was A Coup": Donald Trump's Big Claim Over Biden Exit
content: Donald Trump today, during an interview with Elon Musk on X, recalled the assassination attempt last month where the Republican candidate narrowly survived.
summary: Donald Trump today, during an interview with Elon Musk on X, recalled the assassination attempt last month where the Republican candidate narrowly survived.

title: 5.5 Magnitude Earthquake Hits Syria
content: A magnitude 5.5 earthquake struck 28 km east of the central city of Hama, according to the Syrian National Earthquake Centre.
summary: A magnitude 5.5 earthquake struck 28 km east of the central city of Hama, according to the Syrian National Earthquake Centre.

title: "Rumours, Simply False": US Denies Role In Bangladesh Crisis
content: The United States has rejected the allegations of the government's involvement in the Bangladesh crisis, including the protests in the country that led to the deaths of hundreds of people.
summary: The United States has rejected the allegations of the government's involvement in the Bangladesh crisis, including the protests in the country that led to the deaths of hundreds of people.

title: FBI Investigating After Trump Campaign Says It Was Hacked By Iran
content: The U.S. FBI said on Monday it was investigating after Donald Trump's presidential campaign said its internal communications were hacked and blamed the Iranian government.
summary: The U.S. FBI said on Monday it was investigating after Donald Trump's presidential campaign said its internal communications were hacked and blamed the Iranian government.
